hub.title: One hub for all your insurance needs
hub.description: Manage and organize all your insurance policies in one seamless digital wallet.

organize.title: Organize all your policy documents
organize.description: Whether it's home, auto, health, or life, pull all your insurance details into one place.

compare.title: Understand how your coverage stacks up
compare.description: Analyze your rates and coverage, identify gaps, and save money on your insurance.

alerts.title: Never miss important dates
alerts.description: Get notifications for renewals, payments, and policy expirations.

wellness.title: Track your health and wellness
wellness.description: Connect your health apps and track preventive checkups for better coverage.

gapAnalysis.lifeInsuranceDesc: You have dependents or family obligations without life insurance protection
gapAnalysis.lifeInsuranceRec: Term life insurance (10-30 years) to protect your family's financial future. Amount: 5-10x your annual income
gapAnalysis.disabilityInsuranceDesc: If you cannot work due to illness/injury, your income is at risk
gapAnalysis.disabilityInsuranceRec: Short and long-term disability coverage to replace 60-80% of your income
gapAnalysis.travelInsuranceDesc: You travel but lack travel medical coverage
gapAnalysis.travelInsuranceRec: Annual travel insurance covering medical emergencies, evacuation, and trip cancellation
gapAnalysis.healthInsuranceDesc: Medical expenses can be catastrophic without proper coverage
gapAnalysis.healthInsuranceRec: Private health insurance or comprehensive public coverage with supplemental options
gapAnalysis.homeInsuranceDesc: Your largest asset (home) needs protection against damage and liability
gapAnalysis.homeInsuranceRec: Comprehensive homeowner insurance covering building, contents, and liability (€1M minimum)
gapAnalysis.autoInsuranceDesc: Regular vehicle use without proper coverage creates legal and financial risk
gapAnalysis.emergencyFundDesc: Without emergency savings, unexpected events force debt or insurance claims
gapAnalysis.emergencyFundRec: Build 3-6 months of living expenses in accessible savings (€3k-€15k minimum)
gapAnalysis.petInsuranceRec: Pet health insurance covering accidents, illnesses, and preventive care

recommendations.specialistsAvailable: Our insurance specialists are available to discuss these recommendations

recommendations_items.addDentalDesc: Your health policy covers basic dental, but extended procedures (orthodontics, implants) are excluded.
recommendations_items.addDentalInsight: Dental work costs €800-5,000 per procedure. A dedicated dental rider costs only €15/month.
recommendations_items.addDentalImpact: Protects against €50,000+ in potential out-of-pocket costs
recommendations_items.increaseLifeDesc: Your current life coverage (€100k) may not adequately cover your family's needs with dependents.
recommendations_items.increaseLifeInsight: Financial experts recommend 8-10x annual income. You need €400-500k coverage.
recommendations_items.bundleDiscountDesc: By combining home + auto with same provider, you qualify for 10-15% bundle discount.
recommendations_items.bundleDiscountInsight: Moving your Ergo home policy to your auto insurer could save €180-270/year.
recommendations_items.petInsuranceDesc: You don't have pet insurance, but vet costs are rising 8% annually in Greece.
recommendations_items.petInsuranceInsight: Average vet emergency: €1,500-3,000. Pet insurance starts at €12/month.
recommendations_items.petInsuranceImpact: Covers veterinary emergencies and routine care
recommendations_items.autoRenewalDesc: Your Generali auto insurance renews Dec 15. Get quotes from competitors 30+ days before.
recommendations_items.autoRenewalInsight: Comparing 3 quotes typically saves 15-25% on annual premiums.
recommendations_items.wellnessDesc: Your health policy includes free annual checkup + fitness reimbursement (€300/year).
recommendations_items.wellnessInsight: Only 22% of policyholders use these benefits. You haven't claimed yet this year.

chatbot.greeting: Hello! I'm PolicyWallet AI assistant. How can I help you with your insurance policies today?
chatbot.healthResponse: Your NN Health policy covers 100% of visits to A-list hospitals and unlimited doctor visits. You also have a free annual checkup available!
chatbot.autoResponse: For car accidents, first ensure everyone is safe. Then, call Generali Roadside Assistance at 18118. Your policy covers full damages.
chatbot.petResponse: Max is covered under your Ergo Pet policy. You have €2,000 annual limit for vet expenses. Need to file a claim for a recent visit?
chatbot.agentResponse: Your dedicated agent is Maria K. You can reach her directly through the 'Agents' tab in the sidebar, or I can schedule a call for you.
chatbot.claimResponse: To file a claim, go to the specific policy details page and click 'File New Claim'. I can guide you through the document upload process if you like.
chatbot.defaultResponse: I can help with that. Could you specify which policy you're asking about? (Health, Auto, Home, Life, or Pet)

questionnaire.title: Insurance Gap Analysis Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Step-by-step analysis to identify your coverage needs
questionnaire.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
questionnaire.q1Desc: Your age affects risk assessment and coverage recommendations
questionnaire.q1Guidance: Age is a key factor in determining insurance premiums and coverage needs. Younger adults often have lower premiums but different coverage priorities than older groups.
questionnaire.q2Desc: Family situation impacts liability and dependents' protection
questionnaire.q2Guidance: Married individuals and those with domestic partners often need higher liability coverage and life insurance protection.
questionnaire.q3Title: How many dependents (children) do you have?
questionnaire.q3Desc: Dependents require increased protection and coverage
questionnaire.q3Guidance: Each dependent increases the need for life insurance, disability coverage, and higher liability limits. Parents of 3+ children should prioritize comprehensive protection.
questionnaire.q4Title: What is your annual household income?
questionnaire.q4Desc: Income determines coverage levels and deductible recommendations
questionnaire.q4Guidance: Higher income earners need more robust coverage to protect their assets. Consider income replacement insurance if you're the primary breadwinner.
questionnaire.q5Title: How would you describe your current health?
questionnaire.q5Desc: Health status affects insurance eligibility and premium rates
questionnaire.q5Guidance: Health conditions may require specialized coverage. Early disclosure helps insurers provide accurate quotes and appropriate recommendations.
questionnaire.q6Title: Do you have 3-6 months of emergency savings?
questionnaire.q6Desc: Emergency reserves determine appropriate deductible levels
questionnaire.q6Guidance: Without adequate emergency funds, choose lower deductibles. Strong emergency reserves allow for higher deductibles and lower premiums.
questionnaire.q7Title: How often do you travel internationally?
questionnaire.q7Desc: Travel frequency indicates need for international coverage
questionnaire.q7Guidance: Frequent travelers should consider travel insurance, international health coverage, and trip protection policies.
questionnaire.q8Title: How would you describe your occupation risk?
questionnaire.q8Desc: Work environment affects disability and liability needs
questionnaire.q8Guidance: High-risk occupations require disability insurance and higher liability limits. Physical work also increases accident coverage needs.
